channel.title: Black Mesa closes during very first loading screen
channel.description: I bought Black Mesa and when the main screen is loading (very first! no saves yet) it closes out, but it is still open, I tried installing and uninstalling. I didn't work, please fix this, I have a Windows 10, Intel core duo. I got it off of steam, if unfixable, will get refund. ;( ;( ;(

item.title: Black Mesa closes during very first loading screen
item.dc:creator: RedEye
item.description:
The fix for Windows 10 is to Enable Borderless Fullscreen Mode

Go to Black Mesa’s “Properties” and then “Set launch options.”
Enter “-windowed -noborder” without the quotation marks.

Same thing as above just described a little differently.
Right click the game in your steam games list.
Click properties.
Under the general tab, click “Set Launch options”
Copy paste this:
-windowed -noborder

If the above does not fix it here are some more things to try

Restart your computer.

some other things to try

BMS Chicken Chonnage;350542145705980116:

The only thing I can think of is that it might be a redistributable or a DirectX related issue. This can happen sometimes on Windows 10. Try downloading and installing these redistributables, see if any of these help:

DX9
VC 2013
VC 2010

and Here is another thing to try if none of the above fixes the issue

  1. Verify your game cache once.
  2. Launch the game with -autoconfig launch option for the first time after verifying cache.
    https://support.steampowered.com/kb_article.php?ref=1216-JMTZ-0860#autoconfig
    After a successful launch remove -autoconfig from the launch options.
